title: So this is a thing and I like it. Rito Plz

replies.body: These are so pretty! I think these would work really well as 750 skins, their outfits fit really with both champions base particles. Great work! @u@

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FBQmOero,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-03-23T20:37:29.422+0000)
>
> These are so pretty! I think these would work really well as 750 skins, their outfits fit really with both champions base particles. Great work! @u@

Ooo pls oh pls make these if your not planning on releasing a skin for Diana or Leona 975rp and up anytime soon!!! Give us a little something something while waiting for the next really good Diana and Leona skin hopefully coming real soon.
Wouldn't these skins be considered "really good"?
I'd buy both of these in a heartbeat.  Add +1 to the "yes" column.

Aside from maybe making both of their shield effects a little more hextech-ish it would work great. 

Maybe Leona's E. But don't want to push it.
Nuuuu, no particles! Particles make the skins cost more and then I won't be able to buy them!

Yeah, their shield effects are neutral enough that the base skin shield could still work excellently for both of them. The thing they would have to change would be Leona's Zenith blade particle and Diana's passive particle (to match the shape of her new weapon).
Please yessssssssssssssssssssss! Diana needs some more skins!
Ahh the idea is nice but I'm sure they would do it at 750rp and make them simple skins.
I wouldn't mind it being 750rp skin, skins like this are mainly about the champion you like looking different not the particles.

Yes!

It's interesting to see how Piltovian fashion is perceived in fan art. As Ironstylus has mentioned a few times when talking about a possible Caitlyn rework; the style of Piltover is still something being fleshed out. These look super cool to me though :D
I think the style between old western and modern clothing really fits piltover well :) even if it's not a sure thing yet
CAITLYN REWORK! ;W; PLEASE KEEP CONTINUE I REALLY WANT THIS ! XD
LOVE.
Diana with a steampunk chainsaw? YES PLEASE!
+1 for ladies in corsets.
+ knee high lace-up boots and stockings
Boobs
yes.
So this is a thread about thing that you like & I like this thread for liking this thing I like.
Like-ception

OMG IM STILL WAITING FOR THESE THEY ARE SO BEAUTIFUL HOW ARE THEY NOT MADE YET!?
now leona just got a skin so we gotta wait another year ugh
i hate that dumb skin too -_-

Diana swaps out her chest-toilet-seat for a keyhole shirt.

10/10
The Diana looks a bit like jinx though
the resemblance ends with the fact that they are both white and female
I so want these! I especially like Diana's new blade and Leona's shield
Leona skin so sexy!!!!!!
HAWT HAWT HAWT HAWT HAWT
Plz I need more Diana skins!
I'd rather see Solari Diana and Lunar Leona.
I like!
Amazing skins! Did you draw them?
No i found it on deviantart there is a link to the original artist at the bottom
Please reply telling if you would prefer Eclipse Diana/Leona or Piltover Diana/Leona. comment. i'm curious to what y'all think.

This is exactly what I'd like to see more of. Champions displaying regional fashions would be a neat twist.

Rakkor Singed or Shadow Isles Heimerdinger would be awesome!
i like these
If this doesn't become a thing, I may cry.
Welp, I like it too, but I don't think I wallet will.
ill buy it
I would buy the diana and have my friend buy the leona xD
Very Final Fantasy-esque. I love it.

I think Leona's shield is especially elegant with the almost clockwork like elegance, my only suggestion would be if these did become a thing (which would be freaking awesome) would be to make Diana's blade a little more curved perhaps.

DeviantArt down? Doesn't open for me. {{item:3070}}

Edit: Works now. Awesome skin ideas!
Turbulence.

I need that Leona skin

Diana would be amazing too, but I'd still take Dark Valkyrie over it

It's my first love
These look great!
